mapper.sql: WITH writer_reports AS (SELECT GROUP_SUBMITTER_ID_FK, GROUP_TITLE FROM group_drive_report_tb WHERE GROUP_DRIVER_ID_FK = ${groupDriverIdFk} ORDER BY GROUP_REPORT_ID DESC LIMIT 50 )
mapper.select: SELECT COMPANY FROM submitter_tb WHERE SUBMITTER_ID IN (SELECT GROUP_SUBMITTER_ID_FK FROM writer_reports) GROUP BY COMPANY LIMIT 10
SELECT GROUP_TITLE FROM writer_reports GROUP BY GROUP_TITLE HAVING GROUP_TITLE != '' LIMIT 10

SELECT GROUP_REPORT_ID, DATE_FORMAT(GROUP_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS groupDate, GROUP_TITLE, GROUP_MEMO, GROUP_SUBMITTER_ID_FK, GROUP_PAYMENT_CHK, GROUP_SUBMIT_CHK FROM group_drive_report_tb WHERE GROUP_DRIVER_ID_FK = #{groupDriverIdFk} AND GROUP_TITLE LIKE CONCAT(#{title},'%')
ORDER BY GROUP_TITLE DESC
ORDER BY COMPANY ASC
